comment: Deporting Illegal Immigrants ..~'Pardon me, but if I hear one more time we cant deport M illegals Im headed f/backyd to howl at moon. Is Amer memory so short weve already forgotten the s?'
amr:
# ::snt Deporting Illegal Immigrants ..~'Pardon me, but if I hear one more time we cant deport M illegals Im headed f/backyd to howl at moon. Is Amer memory so short weve already forgotten the s?'
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / pardon-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (d / deport-01
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (ii2 / immigrate-01
                                    :ARG1-of (l / legal-02
                                          :polarity -)))))
            :snt2 (h / head-off-03
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (h2 / hear-01
                              :frequency 1
                              :ARG0 ii3
                              :ARG1 (p3 / possible-01
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (d2 / deport-01
                                          :ARG0 (w / we)
                                          :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                                :ARG1-of (l2 / legal-02
                                                      :polarity -)
                                                :mod (p5 / person
                                                      :name (n / name
                                                            :op1 "M")))))
                              :mod (m2 / more)))
                  :time (m3 / moon))
            :snt3 (s / short-07
                  :ARG1 (m4 / memory
                        :poss (c2 / country
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "America")))
                  :ARG2-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 m4
                        :ARG3 (s2 / so)
                        :ARG6 (f / forget-01
                              :ARG0 w)
                        :ARG1 (s3 / s)
                        :time (a / already)
                        :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown)))))

comment: The terms you have used here are derogatory, and exemplifies racism. You need to refrain from using this language to prevent any harm!
amr:

      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (d / derogatory

            :op2 (e / exemplify-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (r / racism)))

            :ARG2 (r2 / refrain-01
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (u2 / use-01
                        :ARG0 y2

                        :ARG2 (p / prevent-01
                              :ARG0 y2

      :snt1 (n / nice-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :example (a / and
                              :op1 (w2 / wetback)
                              :op2 (b / blackback)
                              :op3 (b2 / brownback))))
            :degree (v / very))
      :snt2 (a2 / and

                  :ARG0-of (ii / invade-01

                  :domain (t / they

comment: Whoa there, Racist views are hurtful and derogatory. Please be considerate of others when posting. Thank you
amr:

      :snt1 (w / whoa
            :mode expressive
            :location (t / there))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 (v / view-02
